function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate disinfection of indoor surfaces in vast open spaces and shadowed areas such as bedrails and telephones in a ward.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission within healthcare settings and other public spaces.","Mitigation":"Implementation of alternative disinfection methods for large open spaces and shadowed areas, alongside the use of complementary technologies.","Technologies":"Advanced UVGI systems, automated disinfection robots, targeted surface coating technologies.","People":"Occupants of healthcare settings, public spaces, and building facilities.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management, public health organizations, building maintenance teams."},{"Description":"Concerns regarding occupants' exposure to UV in upper-room UVGI systems.","Impact":"Potential health risks for occupants due to UV exposure, particularly if not managed within acceptable bands of safety.","Mitigation":"Employment of specially designed lamp fixtures to ensure indirect and low-intensity UV exposure for occupants, as well as adherence to safety threshold limits.","Technologies":"Specially designed lamp fixtures, UV exposure monitoring systems, safety threshold limit sensors.","People":"Occupants of spaces equipped with upper-room UVGI systems.","Owner":"Facility management, system designers, safety regulators."},{"Description":"Dependence of upper-room UVGI system effectiveness on building parameters and system design.","Impact":"Inconsistent disinfection results and reduced effectiveness in controlling contagious disease transmission in varying environments.","Mitigation":"Customized system designs based on building parameters, incorporation of displacement ventilation systems, and regular performance evaluation.","Technologies":"Sophisticated building parameter analysis tools, custom system design software, performance monitoring and control systems.","People":"Occupants of spaces equipped with upper-room UVGI systems, building maintenance and operations teams.","Owner":"System designers, building maintenance teams, facility management."}]}
